response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds significant value to me. After careful consideration, I have decided to offer this product to you at a special price of $950,000. This amount reflects not only the intrinsic worth of the product but also the potential it has to bring substantial benefits to you. I believe that this offer represents a fair and advantageous deal for both parties. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer, and we can discuss further details. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
